settings.heading: Tab Active4 Pro
settings.copy: The newest all-in-one rugged tablet from Samsung is now available with RAM® Mounts powered vehicle docks and charging stations for the Galaxy Tab Active4 Pro. Improve your warehouse workflow with interchangeable docks and mounts to help you increase efficiency and decrease headaches. Whether you're in the warehouse or in the field, workers across the globe recognize RAM® Mounts paired with Samsung as the standard for mobility.

settings.heading: RAM® Vehicle Docks for Tab Active4 Pro
settings.copy: These RAM® EZ-Roll'r™ powered vehicle docks designed specifically for the Samsung Galaxy Tab Active Pro offer a fumble-free vehicle docking solution, compatible with the OEM case and the rugged RAM® Skin™. These docks are available in various configurations including key-locking, powered, and data sync with peripheral support. Each of these docks feature integrated pogo pin charging capabilities for an efficient docking experience while protecting wear and tear on the tablet's ports. Pair with thousands of different RAM® components for a custom mount, based on your environment and vehicle type.

settings.heading: IntelliSkin® with GDS® Tech™ for Tab Active4 Pro
settings.copy: Ruggedized mobile workstations meets standardized docking and charging. IntelliSkin® and GDS® Technology™ form enterprise-ready solutions for the Samsung Galaxy Tab Active4 Pro. Whether you're on the road or in the warehouse, RAM® offers plug and play mounting solutions for your fleet.

settings.heading: Tab Active4 Pro Ergonomic Accessories
settings.copy: RAM designs ergonomic accessories for the Tab Active4 Pro including the form-fit rugged case, RAM® Skin™, and the GDS® Hand-Stand™ Shoulder Strap and Kick Stand. Why fumble around with expensive devices when you can protect your investment while maintaining a frustration-free work environment with GDS® Ergo™ accessories for the Tab Active4 Pro.

settings.heading: No Battery Mode Support
settings.copy: The RAM® Tough-Case™ with USB Type-C for Samsung Galaxy Tab Active4 Pro is the new solution built to support a tethered connection from your vehicle’s power source to the device. This allows you to build a mounting solution around the Tab Active4 Pro’s new ‘No Battery Mode’ feature. This feature allows you to remove the tablet’s battery, or bypass completely, while maintaining power to the Tab Active4 Pro as long as it’s connected to a power source using a USB Type-C connection.
